meanings.definition: A decorative door hanging in Indian culture.
meanings.sent1: During Diwali, we hung a colorful toran on our front door.
meanings.sent2: The toran added a festive touch to the entrance of the house.
meanings.sent3: The toran looked like a rainbow dancing in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a toran of happiness, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the toran captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A type of archway or gateway.
meanings.sent1: The toran at the entrance of the temple was adorned with flowers.
meanings.sent2: People passed under the toran to enter the sacred space.
meanings.sent3: The toran stood tall like a welcoming guardian of the temple.
meanings.sent4: The toran framed the view beyond like a picture-perfect moment.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the toran felt like stepping into another world.
